text: Yige fu zui zhe bu fudan bieren de zui'e. Jiaru yige fuzhong zui zhe qing bieren ti ta fu zui, name, bieren jue buneng ti ta fudan sihao zuiguo, jishi shi jinqin. Ni [mu sheng] zhi neng jinggao anzhong jingwei tamen de zhu [an la] bing jin shou bai gong zhe. Shei jinghua zishen [yuanli zui'e], shei zi shou qi yi. Wei an la shi zuihou de guisu.
